name: Game Jam DV8
description:
Game produced by Kyle Whitfield, Michael, Domenico Malara, and Nureddin.

The game gets harder progressively as you play, there's health pickups and power ups you can obtain, be cautious of the lava outside of the road as they deal damage and so as the incoming meteors!

Use the arrow keys (> & <) and A & D to move from left to right
